DataListSpec.Name: ChildExtension Batch Table List
DataListSpec.Description: Returns all ChildExtension Batch Table records.
DataListSpec.Author: memphis-PC\Administrator

SPDataList.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USP_DATALIST_CHILDEXTENSION_BATCH_TABLE as set nocount on;
select USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[ID], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[BATCHID], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[SEQUENCE], USR_BIRTHDATEACCURACYCODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[PROGRAMCOMPLETIONDATE], USR_CHILDNAMESUFFIXCODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_CHILDLIVESWITHCODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_FATHERWORKSASCODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[FATHERWORKSASOTHER], USR_MOTHERWORKSASCODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[MOTHERWORKSASOTHER], USR_CAREGIVERRELATIONCODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CAREGIVERRELATIONOTHER], USR_CAREGIVERWORKSASCODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CAREGIVERWORKSASOTHER], USR_CAREGIVERREASONCODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[REASONFORCAREGIVEROTHER], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[NUMBEROFSISTERS], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[NUMBEROFBROTHERS], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[HOUSINGWALLWOOD], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[HOUSINGWALLMUD], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[HOUSINGWALLBAMBOO], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[HOUSINGWALLBLOCK], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[HOUSINGWALLOTHER], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[ROOFINGTIN], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[ROOFINGGRASSLEAVES], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[ROOFINGWOOD], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[ROOFINGTILE], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[ROOFINGOTHER], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[WATERSOURCEINDOOR], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[WATERSOURCECOMMUNITYTAP], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[WATERSOURCEBOREHOLEWELL], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[WATERSOURCERIVER], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[WATERSOURCEOTHER], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[COOKINGSOURCEWOODFIRE], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[COOKINGSOURCEELECTRICSTOVE], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[COOKINGSOURCEGASSTOVE], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[COOKINGSOURCEOTHER], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[LIGHTSOURCEELECTRICITY], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[LIGHTSOURCEOILLAMP], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[LIGHTSOURCEGENERATOR], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[LIGHTSOURCENONE], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[LIGHTSOURCEOTHER], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[AREADESCRIPTION], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[MYFAVORITETHINGTODO], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[WHENIPLAYWITHFRIENDSWE], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[WHENATHOMEIHELPOUTBY], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[WHENITALKTOGODIASKHIM], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[WHENIAMATSCHOOLILIKELEARNING], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[SOMEDAYI], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[TWOMOSTFAVORITETHINGS], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[OTHERTHINGSTHECHILDENJOYS], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDPERSONALITY], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDHEALTH], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[SPIRITUALDEVELOPMENT], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[ATTENDINGSCHOOL], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[REASONNOTATTENDINGSCHOOL], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CLASSLEVEL], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[FAVORITESUBJECT], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[VOCATIONALSKILLS], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[ADDITIONALCHILDINFORMATION], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CCHENTEREDBY], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CCHTEMPID], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CURRENTPHOTODATE], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[PHOTOSCANNED], USR_CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[PROFILEUPDATENOTIFICATION], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[FUNDED], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[TEMPCHILDID], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[FIRSTNAME], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[MIDDLENAME], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[LASTNAME], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[GENDERCODE], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[BIRTHDATE], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[ISHIVPOSITIVE], SPROPPCHILDCONDITIONCODE.DESCRIPTION, USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[ISORPHANED], USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[PICTURE] from dbo.USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION left outer join dbo.USR_BIRTHDATEACCURACYCODE on USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[BIRTHDATEACCURACYCODEID] = USR_BIRTHDATEACCURACYCODE.ID left outer join dbo.USR_CHILDNAMESUFFIXCODE on USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDNAMESUFFIXCODEID] = USR_CHILDNAMESUFFIXCODE.ID left outer join dbo.USR_CHILDLIVESWITHCODE on USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDLIVESWITHCODEID] = USR_CHILDLIVESWITHCODE.ID inner join dbo.USR_FATHERWORKSASCODE on USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[FATHERWORKSASCODEID] = USR_FATHERWORKSASCODE.ID inner join dbo.USR_MOTHERWORKSASCODE on USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[MOTHERWORKSASCODEID] = USR_MOTHERWORKSASCODE.ID left outer join dbo.USR_CAREGIVERRELATIONCODE on USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CAREGIVERRELATIONCODEID] = USR_CAREGIVERRELATIONCODE.ID left outer join dbo.USR_CAREGIVERWORKSASCODE on USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CAREGIVERWORKSASCODEID] = USR_CAREGIVERWORKSASCODE.ID left outer join dbo.USR_CAREGIVERREASONCODE on USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CAREGIVERREASONCODEID] = USR_CAREGIVERREASONCODE.ID inner join dbo.USR_CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODE on USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODEID] = USR_CHILDPROFILESTATUSCODE.ID left outer join dbo.USR_CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODE on USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODEID] = USR_CHILDPROFILEUPDATECODE.ID left outer join dbo.SPROPPCHILDCONDITIONCODE on USR_BATCHCHILDEXTENSION.[SPROPPCHILDCONDITIONCODEID] = SPROPPCHILDCONDITIONCODE.ID
